name: FlyingSpaghettiMonsterTentacleWebgl
description:
Tentacle SpaceShip Shooter Game FlyingSpaghettiMonster Tentacle Webgl Touch Mobile, pls await apx 10Mb Loading..
-  Leaderboards only in downloadable free Game of this in Windows (not in webgl)
- WebGL game has separate Leaderboard now, enter Name on start in RED.
- WebGL can quit and it goes back to page, javascript history.back()
- a A zoom about 85% can be set on some iphone to view full screen, hide Toolbar
- type your name in RED last menu field also in iphone via webgl it size up the screen.
- ScoreSpaceJam has this free Windows Game with Leaderboard + comments and likes goto https://itch.io/jam/scorejam20/rate/1664409

 - Touch you can swipe left right and up to fire from space ship
